Class PokemonGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • PokemonGenerator

  • public class PokemonGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    Singleton Class used to create Pokemon from a provided list.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static PokemonGenerator getInstance()
        Retrieves the PokemonGenerator. If instance does not exist, create it.
        Returns:
        PokemonGenerator Instance

      • generateRandomPokemon

        public Pokemon generateRandomPokemon(int level)
        Returns a random Pokemon. A valid Pokemon is polymorphic to Fire / Water / Grass Every level above 1 adds a buff.
        Parameters:
        level - Level Number
        Returns:
        Random Pokemon of that level.

      • getPokemon

        public Pokemon getPokemon(java.lang.String name)
        Returns a Pokemon Object based on the name. This pokemon is a basic pokemon (Level 1).
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the Pokemon
        Returns:
        Level 1 Pokemon Object (No Buffs / Debuffs).

      • addRandomBuff

        public Pokemon addRandomBuff(Pokemon p)
        Returns a Pokemon decorated with a random buff.
        Parameters:
        p - Pokemon to buff.
        Returns:
        Buffed Pokemon

      • addRandomDebuff

        public Pokemon addRandomDebuff(Pokemon p)
        Returns a Pokemon decorated with a random debuff.
        Parameters:
        p - Pokemon to debuff.
        Returns:
        Debuffed Pokemon
